name: The Heart Attack (Jordan Magnuson)
description:
A small notgame/game poem about two disparate lives that collide in war. Takes about five minutes to play through, and requires no gaming skills. Originally made for my GameTrekking project in 2011.

This game was ported to HTML5 in 2022 by myself, Jeffry Robbins, and Julius McWilliams.

Content warning: war themes and photographs.
